name: helix-db (HelixDB)
description: [项目级] HelixDB is an open-source graph-vector database built from scratch in Rust.。来源: https://github.com/HelixDB/helix-db

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
HelixDB is an open-source graph-vector database built from scratch in Rust.

来源: https://github.com/HelixDB/helix-db
语言: Rust
Stars: 3829

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
|                         |                                                                                                                                        |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Built-in MCP tools**  | Helix has built-in MCP support to allow your agents to discover data and walk the graph rather than generating human readable queries. |
| **Built-in Embeddings** | No need to embed your data before sending it to Helix, just use the `Embed` f
